content:
I introduced Safe Roads Act of 2021 because the simple installation of automatic braking systems on all commercial motor vehicles – a $500 safety feature – could have prevented countless deaths across the country.

America’s roads and highways should be safe for all drivers. Taking full advantage of technologies that are available and proven to anticipate and prevent crashes will save lives.

https://bit.ly/3pEoYqf

content:
I am honored to introduce H.Res. 463, a resolution to designate the week of June 6 through June 12, 2021, as National Child Abuse Prevention Week. Children thrive when they grow up in a safe and loving environment, yet sadly, too many children across our nation are often victims of abuse. During this pandemic, there has been a rise in reports of domestic violence and child abuse. We must take a proactive approach to protect our most vulnerable and work to ensure they can lead happy and healthy lives.

https://lawson.house.gov/media/press-releases/reps-lawson-and-rutherford-introduce-child-abuse-prevention-resolution

LAWSON.HOUSE.GOV
Reps. Lawson and Rutherford Introduce Child Abuse Prevention Resolution | U.S. Congressman Al Lawson
name: Al Lawson, Jr.
text: honored introduce hres resolution designate week june june national child abuse prevention week children thrive grow safe loving environment yet sadly many children across nation often victims abuse pandemic rise reports domestic violence child abuse must take proactive approach protect vulnerable work ensure lead happy healthy liveslawsonhousegovreps lawson rutherford introduce child abuse prevention resolution us congressman al lawson
